thread.title: Man heartlessly ties a dog to a fence and walks away
thread.title_full: Man heartlessly ties a dog to a fence and walks away

title: Man heartlessly ties a dog to a fence and walks away
text: Share this article Share 'There was extensive fur loss and it was near to freezing so she must have been very cold. 'The little dog was tied to a fence with a ragged old bit of blue rope. 'Luckily, she was dumped outside a house with CCTV so we're now able to release the footage of her being abandoned in the hope of finding the person responsible for such cruelty.' The man then ties the dog up before running away. The lurcher watches on as her owner leaves Ella, as she's now been named by staff caring for her, will be treated for a skin infection and then remain in RSPCA care Ella, as she's now been named by staff caring for her, will be treated for a skin infection and then remain in RSPCA care. 'She has no microchip or identification so I'd be keen to hear from anyone who might recognise her or know where she's come from. 'I'd also like people to take a close look at the CCTV and get in touch if they think they may know the culprit,' inspector Stubbs urged. Anyone who can aid the investigation should call our inspector appeal line on 0300 123 8018. Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
